file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
    /test:
        get:
            operationId: getTest
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            type: object
                            allOf:
                            - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Foo'
                            - type: object
                              properties:
                                  Bar:
                                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/Bar'
                                  Baz:
                                      type: object
                                      properties:
                                          baz:
                                              type: string
                required: true
            responses:
                default:
                    description: Default response
        post:
            operationId: test
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                                foo:
                                    type: string
                required: true
            responses:
                default:
                    description: Default response
info:
    version: ''
    title: ''
components:
    schemas:
        Foo:
            type: object
            properties:
                foo:
                    type: string
        Bar:
            allOf:
            - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Foo'
            - type: object
              properties:
                  bar:
                      type: string
